mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO mer_tb (mer_thumb_img,mer_title,mer_person,mer_old_price,mer_price,mer_stock,mer_code, mer_discount, mer_postage, mer_update_time, mer_status, mer_cate_id, seller_id) VALUES (#{merThumbImg},#{merTitle},#{merPerson},#{merOldPrice},#{merPrice},#{merStock},#{merCode}, #{merDiscount}, #{merPostage}, #{merUpdateTime}, #{merStatus}, #{merCateId}, #{sellerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE mer_tb SET mer_thumb_img=#{merThumbImg}, mer_title=#{merTitle}, mer_person=#{merPerson}, mer_old_price=#{merOldPrice}, mer_price=#{merPrice}, mer_stock=#{merStock}, mer_code=#{merStock}, mer_discount=#{merDiscount}, mer_postage=#{merPostage}, mer_update_time=#{merUpdateTime}, mer_status=#{merStatus}, mer_cate_id=#{merCateId}, seller_id=#{sellerId} WHERE mer_id=#{merId} AND seller_id=#{sellerId}
mapper.select: SELECT mer_id, mer_thumb_img, mer_title, mer_person, mer_old_price, mer_price, mer_stock, mer_code, mer_discount, mer_postage, mer_update_time, mer_status, mer_cate_id, seller_id FROM mer_tb WHERE mer_id=#{merId}

SELECT mer_id, mer_thumb_img, mer_title, mer_person, mer_old_price, mer_price, mer_stock, mer_code, mer_discount, mer_postage, mer_update_time, mer_status, mer_cate_id, seller_id FROM mer_tb WHERE mer_status=#{merStatus} AND seller_id=#{sellerId} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT mer_id, mer_thumb_img, mer_title, mer_person, mer_old_price, mer_price, mer_stock, mer_code, mer_discount, mer_postage, mer_update_time, mer_status, mer_cate_id, seller_id FROM mer_tb WHERE mer_status=#{merStatus} AND seller_id=#{sellerId} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay}

SELECT mer_id, mer_thumb_img, mer_title, mer_person, mer_old_price, mer_price, mer_stock, mer_code, mer_discount, mer_postage, mer_update_time, mer_status, mer_cate_id, seller_id FROM mer_tb WHERE mer_title LIKE '%' #{merTitle} '%' AND seller_id=#{sellerId}
